Source code for mc.examples.interpolations.test_example

import os
import subprocess
import textwrap
import unittest



[docs]class TestExample(unittest.TestCase):

[docs]    def test_example(self):
        cmd = 'cd {this_dir} && python entrypoint.py'.format(
            this_dir=os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
        )
        stdout = subprocess.check_output(cmd, shell=True).decode()
        expected_stdout = textwrap.dedent(
            '''
            msg set by task_1
            value from task_1.data
            '''
        ).lstrip()
        self.assertEqual(stdout, expected_stdout)
